name: AIDSMAP
description: UK-based website offering HIV resources including a database of international services, a series of booklets, daily news reporting, regular email bulletins and comprehensive summaries of research on HIV treatment and prevention.

name: AVERT
description: AVERT is an international HIV and AIDS charity based in the UK, with the aim of AVERTing HIV and AIDS worldwide.

name: Being gay is OK!
description: A website offering great support for anyone struggling to deal with being gay.

name: Condom Essential Wear
description: Advice on safer sex and using condoms.

name: Galop
description: London's lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community safety charity.
